comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Thanks Beachcomber, this must be the same day. We are interested in identifying the steam yacht at front (TBC). What a fascinating story re Lightoller & his Boer War 'prank'!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons]  The State Records NSW catalogue says the steam yacht at front is the "NSW Government Steam Launch PREMIER".  Unfortunately the captions for Series 4481 are notoriously unreliable, or perhaps fortunately because it has meant a lot of flickr fun for sleuths.   A quick browse around Trove looks like this particular ID might be true.
